description: Put a twist on a classic with this butter chicken skewer recipe. Ready in just 20 minutes, these skewers served with salad are great for alfresco feasting.
keywords: Quick Butter Chicken Skewers With Buffalo Salad
name: Quick Butter Chicken Skewers With Buffalo Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600 g Australian RSPCAapproved chicken breast fillets
300 g The Spice Tailor classic butter chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Toss salad with dressing from kit in a bowl until combined. Fluff rice with a fork. Divide rice and salad among plates. Top with chicken skewers and sauce.
